resources.string:
Application version 1.0 
 Developers: 
 Lena Kazantseva, 
 Tara Davoodnia, 
 Ruth Anne Sebastian , 
 Maxim Kasyanenko

My Handy App contains 4 mini apps.
 1.New York Times Article Search,
 2.News Feed,
 3.Merriam Webster Dictionary and
 4.Flight Status tracker

Click on one of the buttons to go the desired service.
No Data Found, Check Airport Code\n
Flight Tracker data provided by \n Aviation-edge.com\n

Flight Tracker version 1.0 
Developed by: Lena Kazantseva 

To list currnet flights from an airport, enter Airport Code and click Search; 

Example: for Ottawa enter YOW, Toronto YYZ, Montreal YUL. 

Scroll and select desired Flight. 
Click on the Flight to view more details. 

You can save flight for future reference, ore remove it from saved list. 

Click on Reset to clear all flights
Data provided by \n New York Times website \n
NYT help ... \n\n change as you need
News help ... \n\n change as you need
Data provided by Merriam Webster Dictionary\n www.dictionaryapi.com \n
Dictinary help ... \n\n change as you need
